cc

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.Sprite
      • cc.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends Sprite
    The Circle class represents a battle bot sprite in its generic form.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Robert, Brian, Dalton, Derek
    See Also:
    Sprite
